change.changenote: Schedule, item "Lh√°:lt / Harrison-Chehalis Wildlife Management Area" was added by BC Reg 272/2016, effective November 16, 2016.
Schedule, item "Todagin Wildlife Management Area" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 177/2016, effective July 11, 2016.
change.bcl:indent1: All those parcels or tracts of Crown land, together with all that foreshore or land covered by water, situated in Cassiar District and contained within the described boundaries as shown on the Official Plan deposited in the Crown Land Registry as Plan 15 Tube 1942.
The whole wildlife management area containing approximately 122 506 hectares.

change.changenote: Schedule, item "Swan Lake Wildlife Management Area" was added by BC Reg 123/2018, effective June 20, 2018.
Schedule, item "S'amunu Wildlife Management Area" was added by BC Reg 285/2018, effective December 17, 2018.
